mapper.select: SELECT seq AS sequence, title, content AS text, read_count AS readCount, reg_id AS registor, mod_id AS modifier, reg_ymdt AS registeredDate, mod_ymdt AS modifiedDate FROM board WHERE del_yn = 'n' ORDER BY seq DESC

SELECT seq AS sequence, title, content AS text, short_url AS shortUrl, read_count AS readCount, reg_id AS registor, mod_id AS modifier, reg_ymdt AS registeredDate, mod_ymdt AS modifiedDate FROM board WHERE seq = #{sequence} AND del_yn = 'n'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, content, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES( #{title}, #{text}, #{registor}, #{modifier} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET read_count = read_count + 1 WHERE seq = #{sequence}
